channel.title: TBB NoScript bug fix in progress
channel.description:
TPO working on fixing the running of JS with security slider set to highest. Noscript's failure to completely block JS is caused by a Firefox bug which they are trying to work around.
https://blog.torproject.org/new-release-tor-browser-907
